name: Lead Source Billing Analysis
query:
select
lead_source as "LeadSource:Data:250",
count(CASE WHEN NewBilling > 0 THEN 1 END) as "New Count:Int:100",
count(CASE WHEN RepeatBilling > 1 THEN 1 END) as "Repeat Count:Int:120",
sum(NewBilling) as "New Billing:Currency:150",
sum(RepeatBilling) as "Repeat Billing:Currency:150"
from
(select lead_source as "lead_source",
count(CASE WHEN creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s THEN customer END) as "newcount",
count(CASE WHEN creation < %(from_date)s THEN customer END) as "repeatcount" ,
sum(NewBilling) as "NewBilling",
sum(RepeatBilling) as "RepeatBilling"
from
(SELECT lead_source,
sum(NewBilling) as NewBilling,
sum(RepeatBilling) as RepeatBilling,
customer_n as customer,
creation as creation
from
(
SELECT 
pv.name as 'payment:Link/Payment Entry',
mini.creation as creation,
c.name as customer_n,
c.customer_name as customer_name,
c.lead_source as Lead_Source, 0 as NewCount, 
count(pv.name) as RepeatCount,
sum(CASE WHEN mini.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s THEN pv.paid_amount ELSE 0 END) as NewBilling,
sum(CASE WHEN mini.creation < %(from_date)s THEN pv.paid_amount ELSE 0 END) as RepeatBilling
from `tabCustomer` c
INNER JOIN `tabPayment Entry` as pv
on c.name= pv.party
INNER JOIN
(select 
SI.customer_name, SI.customer, MIN(SI.creation) as creation
from `tabSales Invoice` as SI
group by SI.customer) as mini
on mini.customer = c.name
where pv.payment_type = 'Receive' and pv.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
group by c.lead_source, c.name
) as P group by P.lead_source, P.customer_n

UNION ALL

SELECT lead_source,
sum(NewBilling) as NewBilling,
sum(RepeatBilling) as RepeatBilling,
customer_n as customer,
creation as creation
from
(
SELECT 
mini.creation as creation,
si.name as 'payment:Link/Payment Entry',
c.name as customer_n,
c.customer_name as customer_name,
c.lead_source as Lead_Source,
sum(CASE WHEN mini.creation between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s THEN si.paid_amount ELSE 0 END) as NewBilling,
sum(CASE WHEN mini.creation < %(from_date)s THEN si.paid_amount ELSE 0 END) as RepeatBilling
from `tabCustomer` c
INNER JOIN `tabSales Invoice` as si
on c.name= si.customer
INNER JOIN
(select 
SI.customer_name, SI.customer, MIN(SI.creation) as creation
from `tabSales Invoice` as SI
group by SI.customer) as mini
on mini.customer = c.name
where si.posting_date between %(from_date)s and %(to_date)s
and (si.status ='Paid' or si.status ='Overdue' or si.status = 'Partly Paid')
group by c.lead_source, c.name
) as S group by S.lead_source, S.customer_n ) as final_group group by final_group.lead_source , final_group.customer ) as FG group by FG.lead_source
